answers.answer: I am not really sure what is going on.  Doesn't sound cardiac related.  Maybe more nervous system related or even a compressed disc in the spine.  I would suggest bringing this up with your doctor and see what they say.  It may be nothing to worry about but best to let the doctor know just in case it is something more.  Take care.

question: Hello.  I'm 53 years old.  Over the last few months, whenever I take a short nap (anywhere, bed, sofa) when I wake I would feel a vibrating, usually in my legs but sometimes all over.  I'm not shivering and it's far faster than a normal twitching.  I do take am Jen to sleep at night and I do not wake up with this issue in the AM.  I am not in pain.  And for the longest time I just realized it was happening and just get up and it's gone.  I do t map often but did for about an hour middle of the day.  I reached down and could actually feel the vi rations or excessively fast twitching in my R leg (which was against the bed).  I do t remember if I felt it anywhere else cause this surprised me that I could feel it.  My heart rate is slow and regular when this is happening.  It was the first thing I checked the first few times it had happened.  I'm not too worried, but I'm a nurse and should I be?  I have not yet mentioned to my internist.  I have several other comorbidities, not sure if they play a part.  I take several medications for these, cholesterol, HDL/LDL, diabetes, anxiety, hypertension, heart palpitations (totally different from what I am feeling), allergies/asthma, pain, sometimes prednisone for respiratory issues, depression,acid reflux.  I have cut out many medications and on the lowest dose possible with the remaining Meds.  I know this is a lot of information.  Just wondering if anyone else has experienced this and what they have found out.  I would like to go to my MD with it but with some info that may be helpful in figuring out what's going on.  I've also recently lost 60# over 2 years, still over weight.  Thank you in advance for your replies.  If you could also respond in my email if that is allowed it would be easier for me to find.
title: Vibrating legs after a short nap
